title: 2. How is Ebola spread?
content:
Ebola is spread when a healthy person:

 1. List item

 - Comes in contact with body fluids (blood, saliva, vomitus, stool, urine, sweat and other body fluids)
from a person who is infected with Ebola.
 - Handles dead bodies of persons who have died from Ebola.
 - Handles personal effects of persons infected or who have died from Ebola e.g. Clothing, beddings. 
 - Comes in contact with contaminated environment (surfaces).
 - Can also be spread by handling or eating raw meat of Ebola infected chimpanzees, gorillas,
monkeys, porcupines, forest antelopes and Fruit Bats. Note: Ebola cannot be transmitted through the air.
